titleStmt.title: A testimony against gaming, musick, dancing, singing, swearing and peoples calling upon God to damn them. Commended to the consciences of all people in the sight of God, but more especially to those who keep publick houses.
titleStmt.author: Kelsall, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: re-printed with additions, by John Bringhurst,

notesStmt.note: Print faded, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
